```
=> a*(1 + b) = x     => a = x / (1 + b)      ...eq.(1)       [equation derived using algebraic manipulation]

```

This results in --> (xy/b)+b

Therefore,\[ \frac{\omega^2-\omega+1}{\omega^2}=\frac{(1-\omega)(1+\omega)}{\omega^2}=\frac{1-\omega^2}{\omega^2}=-\frac{1}{\omega^2}-1.\] Answer choices include options like (A) -\frac{1}{\omega}, etc., but none matches our simplified expression directly as they appear without considering powers or negative signs within them.
